official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of the duties on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1997, the suspension of duty on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of the duties on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.
